Name: Tanglefoot
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Light rum, lemon and orange juice served short with a tang of Swedish punch.
Nutrition: One serving of Tanglefoot contains 204 calories
